src:
Lançado novo driver para gráficas Nvidia optimizado para Red Dead Redemption 2
Novo driver garante a melhor experiência em Red Dead Redemption 2.

05 Nov 2019, 14:00

A Nvidia lançou o driver GeForce 441.12 WHQL que optimiza o desempenho e garante a melhor experiência de jogo em Red Dead Redemption 2 (Rockstar Games), Need for Speed Heat (Electronic Arts/Ghost Games) e Borderlands 3 (Gearbox Software/2K Games).
Adicionalmente, este driver adiciona o suporte para mais monitores com tecnologia G-Sync, perfis para Borderlands 3 e Red Dead Redemption 2, e ajuda a mitigar um problema observado em Super Robot Wars V (crash) da Bandai Namco Entertainment.
A empresa de Santa Clara, EUA, confirma também que está a par dos problemas em Battlefield V (G-Sync/HDR) e Grand Theft Auto V (crash).
text:
New Nvidia Graphics Driver Optimized for Red Dead Redemption 2 Released
New driver ensures the best experience in Red Dead Redemption 2.

05 Nov 2019, 14:00

Nvidia has released GeForce 441.12 WHQL driver that optimizes performance and ensures the best gaming experience in Red Dead Redemption 2 (Rockstar Games), Need for Speed Heat (Electronic Arts / Ghost Games) and Borderlands 3 (Gearbox Software / 2K Games) .
Additionally, this driver adds support for more G-Sync technology monitors, Borderlands 3 and Red Dead Redemption 2 profiles, and helps mitigate a problem observed in Bandai Namco Entertainment's Super Robot Wars V (crash).
The Santa Clara, US company also confirms that it is aware of the issues in Battlefield V (G-Sync / HDR) and Grand Theft Auto V (crash).
